dict.string: Upload files and directories for easy sharing

notification() { ./_licensed/terminal-notifier/terminal-notifier.app/Contents/MacOS/terminal-notifier -title 'UploadFile' -message "${1}" }
ascii_basename() { basename "$1" | sed -e 's/[^a-zA-Z0-9._-]/-/g' }
transfer() { progress_file='/tmp/uploadfile_progress' name_file='/tmp/uploadfile_name' # for use with 'ufp' (in Alfred)
# prepare file and normalise name full_file="$1"
if [[ -d "${full_file}" ]]; then dir_name=$(ascii_basename "${full_file}") zip_file="/tmp/${dir_name}.zip" ditto -ck "${full_file}" "${zip_file}" full_file="${zip_file}" fi
file=$(ascii_basename "${full_file}")
echo -n "${file}" > "${name_file}"
# message before starting upload notification "Uploading “${file}”"
# upload and copy url to clipboard curl --progress-bar --upload-file "${full_file}" "https://transfer.sh/${basefile}" 2> "${progress_file}" | tr -d '\n' | pbcopy
# Play a sound afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Ping.aiff }
transfer "{query}" notification "Uploaded “${file}”"
# delete temporary files rm "${progress_file}" "${name_file}"

progress_file='/tmp/uploadfile_progress' name_file='/tmp/uploadfile_name'
if [[ -f "${progress_file}" ]]; then
filename=$(cat "${name_file}") progress=$(cat "${progress_file}" | perl -pe 's/.*\s//')
cat << EOF <?xml version='1.0'?><items> <item uid='Upload progress' valid='yes'> <title>UploadFile Progress</title> <subtitle>${progress} | <![CDATA[${filename}]]></subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item> </items> EOF else cat << EOF <?xml version='1.0'?><items> <item uid='Upload progress' valid='no'> <title>UploadFile Progress</title> <subtitle>There is currently no upload in progress</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item> </items> EOF fi
Shows progress of the current UploadFile upload

# set notifications notification() { ./_licensed/terminal-notifier/terminal-notifier.app/Contents/MacOS/terminal-notifier -title 'UploadFile' -message "${1}" }
progress_file='/tmp/uploadfile_progress' name_file='/tmp/uploadfile_name' file=$(cat "${name_file}")
kill $(ps -A | grep "curl.*${file}" | awk '{print $1}') rm "${progress_file}" "${name_file}"
notification 'Upload canceled'
